verses.verse: Then Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> the Temanite <S%H8489><s%> responded, <S%H6030><s%> <S%H559><s%>

"Should a wise <S%H2450><s%> man <S%H2450><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> with windy <S%H7307><s%> knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> And fill <S%H4390><s%> himself <S%H990><s%> with the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H6921><s%>?
"Should he argue <S%H3198><s%> with useless <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5532><s%> talk, <S%H1697><s%> Or with words <S%H4405><s%> which are not profitable <S%H3276><s%>?
"Indeed, <S%H637><s%> you do <S%H6565><s%> away <S%H6565><s%> with reverence, <S%H3374><s%> And hinder <S%H1639><s%> meditation <S%H7881><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God. <S%H410><s%>
"For your guilt <S%H5771><s%> teaches <S%H502><s%> your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> And you choose <S%H977><s%> the language <S%H3956><s%> of the crafty. <S%H6175><s%>
"Your own mouth <S%H6310><s%> condemns <S%H7561><s%> you, and not I; And your own lips <S%H8193><s%> testify <S%H6030><s%> against you.
"Were you the first <S%H7223><s%> man <S%H120><s%> to be born, <S%H3205><s%> Or were you brought <S%H9123><s%> forth <S%H9123><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the hills <S%H1389><s%>?
"Do you hear <S%H8085><s%> the secret <S%H5475><s%> counsel <S%H5475><s%> of God, <S%H433><s%> And limit <S%H1639><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> to yourself?
"What <S%H4100><s%> do you know <S%H3045><s%> that we do not know <S%H3045><s%>? [What] do you understand <S%H995><s%> that we do not?
"Both <S%H1571><s%> the gray-haired and the aged <S%H3453><s%> are among us, Older <S%H3524><s%> <S%H3117><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> your father.
"Are the consolations <S%H8575><s%> of God <S%H410><s%> too <S%H4480><s%> small <S%H4592><s%> for you, Even the word <S%H1697><s%> [spoken] gently <S%H328><s%> with you?
"Why <S%H4100><s%> does your heart <S%H3820><s%> carry <S%H3947><s%> you away? And why <S%H4100><s%> do your eyes <S%H5869><s%> flash, <S%H7335><s%>
That you should turn <S%H7725><s%> your spirit <S%H7307><s%> against <S%H413><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> And allow [such] words <S%H4405><s%> to go <S%H3318><s%> out of your mouth <S%H6310><s%>?
"What <S%H4100><s%> is man, <S%H582><s%> that he should be pure, <S%H2135><s%> Or he who is born <S%H3205><s%> of a woman, <S%H802><s%> that he should be righteous <S%H6663><s%>?

"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> He puts <S%H539><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> trust <S%H539><s%> in His holy <S%H6918><s%> ones, <S%H6918><s%> And the heavens <S%H8064><s%> are not pure <S%H2141><s%> in His sight; <S%H5869><s%>

How <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> less <S%H637><s%> one who is detestable <S%H8581><s%> and corrupt, <S%H444><s%> Man, <S%H376><s%> who drinks <S%H8354><s%> iniquity <S%H9390><s%> like water! <S%H4325><s%>
"I will tell <S%H2331><s%> you, listen <S%H8085><s%> to me; And what <S%H2088><s%> I have seen <S%H2372><s%> I will also declare; <S%H5608><s%>
What <S%H834><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H2450><s%> have told, <S%H5046><s%> And have not concealed <S%H3582><s%> from their fathers,
To whom <S%H1992><s%> alone <S%H905><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> was given, <S%H5414><s%> And no <S%H3808><s%> alien <S%H2114><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

"The wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H7563><s%> writhes <S%H9123><s%> in pain <S%H9123><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> [his] days, <S%H3117><s%> And numbered <S%H4557><s%> are the years <S%H8141><s%> stored <S%H6845><s%> up for the ruthless. <S%H6184><s%>
"Sounds <S%H6963><s%> of terror <S%H6343><s%> are in his ears, <S%H241><s%> While at peace <S%H7965><s%> the destroyer <S%H7703><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> upon him.
"He does not believe <S%H539><s%> that he will return <S%H7725><s%> from darkness, <S%H2822><s%> And he is destined <S%H6822><s%> for the sword. <S%H2719><s%>
"He wanders <S%H5074><s%> about for food, <S%H3899><s%> saying, 'Where <S%H346><s%> is it?' He knows <S%H3045><s%> that a day <S%H3117><s%> of darkness <S%H2822><s%> is at hand. <S%H3027><s%>
"Distress <S%H9496><s%> and anguish <S%H4691><s%> terrify <S%H1204><s%> him, They overpower <S%H8630><s%> him like a king <S%H4428><s%> ready <S%H6264><s%> for the attack, <S%H3593><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> he has stretched <S%H5186><s%> out his hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H413><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> And conducts <S%H1396><s%> himself arrogantly <S%H1396><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the Almighty. <S%H7706><s%>
"He rushes <S%H7323><s%> headlong <S%H6677><s%> at Him With his massive <S%H5672><s%> <S%H1354><s%> shield. <S%H4043><s%>
"For he has covered <S%H3680><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> with his fat, <S%H2459><s%> And made <S%H6213><s%> his thighs <S%H3689><s%> heavy <S%H6371><s%> with flesh. <S%H6371><s%>

"And he has lived <S%H7931><s%> in desolate <S%H3582><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> In houses <S%H1004><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> one would inhabit, <S%H3427><s%> Which <S%H834><s%> are destined <S%H6257><s%> to become ruins. <S%H1530><s%>

"He will not become <S%H6238><s%> rich, <S%H6238><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> will his wealth <S%H2428><s%> endure; <S%H6965><s%> And his grain <S%H4512><s%> will not bend <S%H5186><s%> down <S%H5186><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>

"He will not escape <S%H5493><s%> from darkness; <S%H2822><s%> The flame <S%H7957><s%> will wither <S%H3001><s%> his shoots, <S%H3127><s%> And by the breath <S%H7307><s%> of His mouth <S%H6310><s%> he will go <S%H5493><s%> away. <S%H5493><s%>
"Let him not trust <S%H539><s%> in emptiness, <S%H7723><s%> deceiving <S%H8582><s%> himself; For emptiness <S%H7723><s%> will be his reward. <S%H8545><s%>
"It will be accomplished <S%H4390><s%> before <S%H3808><s%> his time, <S%H3117><s%> And his palm <S%H3712><s%> branch <S%H3712><s%> will not be green. <S%H9569><s%>

"He will drop <S%H2554><s%> off <S%H2554><s%> his unripe <S%H1155><s%> grape <S%H1155><s%> like the vine, <S%H1612><s%> And will cast <S%H7993><s%> off <S%H7993><s%> his flower <S%H5328><s%> like the olive <S%H2132><s%> tree. <S%H2132><s%>
"For the company <S%H5712><s%> of the godless <S%H2611><s%> is barren, <S%H1565><s%> And fire <S%H784><s%> consumes <S%H398><s%> the tents <S%H168><s%> of the corrupt. <S%H7810><s%>
"They conceive <S%H2029><s%> mischief <S%H5999><s%> and bring <S%H3205><s%> forth <S%H3205><s%> iniquity, <S%H205><s%> And their mind <S%H990><s%> prepares <S%H3559><s%> deception. <S%H4820><s%>"
